mapper.select: SELECT * FROM spot WHERE spot_code LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY spot_readcnt

select.if: SELECT * FROM spot WHERE spot_code LIKE '4%01' ORDER BY spot_readcnt
SELECT * FROM spot WHERE spot_code LIKE CONCAT('4%',#{keyword}) ORDER BY spot_readcnt

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM spot WHERE spot_code LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY spot_readcnt
SELECT * FROM spot WHERE spot_code LIKE CONCAT(#{spotCode},'%') limit #{spotNo}, 1;

SELECT *, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{spotY} ) ) * cos( radians( spot_y ) ) * cos( radians( spot_x ) - radians( #{spotX} ) ) + sin( radians( #{spotY} ) ) * sin( radians( spot_y ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM spot HAVING distance < 2 ORDER BY distance

SELECT *, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians( #{spotY} ) ) * cos( radians( spot_y ) ) * cos( radians( spot_x ) - radians( #{spotX} ) ) + sin( radians( #{spotY} ) ) * sin( radians( spot_y ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM spot WHERE spot_code LIKE '1%' HAVING distance < 2 ORDER BY distance
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spot (spot_code, spot_title, spot_phone, spot_address, spot_detail, spot_x, spot_y, spot_img, spot_createtime, spot_modifytime, spot_province, spot_detailurl) VALUES (#{spotCode},#{spotTitle},#{spotPhone},#{spotAddress},#{spotDetail},#{spotX},#{spotY},#{spotImg},NOW(),NOW(),#{spotProvince},#{spotDetailURL})
mapper.update: UPDATE spot SET spot_title = #{spotTitle}, spot_code = #{spotCode}, spot_phone = #{spotPhone}, spot_address = #{spotAddress}, spot_detail = #{spotDetail}, spot_x = #{spotX}, spot_y = #{spotY}, spot_img = #{spotImg}, spot_modifytime = NOW(), spot_province = #{spotProvince}, spot_detailurl = #{spotDetailURL} WHERE spot_no = #{spotNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(spot_no) AS totalspot FROM spot;

SELECT * FROM spot WHERE (spot_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR spot_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR spot_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')) and spot_code LIKE CONCAT(#{searchSpot},'%')
SELECT * FROM spot WHERE spot_code not like '3%' ORDER BY spot_readcnt limit 0, 9

SELECT spot_no, spot_title, spot_img, spot_address, spot_phone FROM spot
WHERE spot_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') AND spot_code NOT IN ('30', '31' ,'32')
WHERE spot_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchSpot},'%') AND spot_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') AND spot_code NOT IN ('30', '31' ,'32')
WHERE spot_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchSpot},'%') AND spot_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') AND spot_code NOT IN ('30', '31' ,'32')
WHERE spot_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchSpot},'%') AND spot_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') AND spot_code NOT IN ('30', '31' ,'32')
ORDER BY spot_readcnt limit 0, 30
